data.text:
Carnival in Flanders is a stage musical based on the 1953 film, La Kermesse Héroïque.

Cast[]

Dolores Gray - Cornelia

John Raitt - The Duke

Roy Roberts - The Mayor

Kevin Scott - Jan Breughel

Pat Stanley - Siska

Lee Goodman - Innkeeper

Paul Lipson - Butcher

Ray Mason - 1st Officer

George Martin - 2nd Officer

Matt Mattox - Courier

Paul Reed - Tailor

Bobby Vail - Barber

Plot[]

The story is set in 1616 in the small Flemish village of Flackenburg, where a Spanish duke and his entourage descend upon the community. The mayor plays dead, hoping that his ruse will force the visitors to depart, but the duke sets his sights on the man's "widow" and begins to woo her.
